item.title: WA lawmaker proposes honor system road usage charge program | Washington | thecentersquare.com
item.description: News article "WA lawmaker proposes honor system road usage charge program | Washington | thecentersquare.com" from The Center Square.

item.title: 👍Reema Griffith - Wash. State Transportation Commission
item.description: Reema Griffith signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Wash. State Transportation Commission.

item.title: 👎Laurie Layne - Mayor, City of Issaquah
item.description: Laurie Layne signed up to testify Con.

item.title: 👍Ashley Probart - Transportation Improvement Board
item.description: Ashley Probart signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Transportation Improvement Board.

item.title: 👍💵Jane Wall - Washington State County Road Administration Board
item.description: Jane Wall signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State County Road Administration Board. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Axel Swanson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Association of County Engineers. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Carl Schroeder signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Cities. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Chris Herman - Washington Public Ports Association
item.description: Chris Herman signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington Public Ports Association.

item.title: 👎Tim Eyman - Initiative Activist
item.description: Tim Eyman signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Initiative Activist.

item.title: 👍Commissioner Carolina Mejia - Thurston County
item.description: Commissioner Carolina Mejia signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Thurston County.
